content.p: Lists and registers In this section you can find information about those centrally held lists and registers which are publically available. Please note that some of these are only available on request or by appointment. Assets Registers (a list of all buildings owned by UoN) overt CCTV The Register of Gifts is available to view by appointment only. Please contact registrars@nottingham.ac.uk The Register of Interests is available to view by appointment only. Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
